survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart thermostats to understand satisfaction levels, usability, and potential areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart thermostat overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis. Ensure the question is prominently placed to capture immediate impressions.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart thermostat overall?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify popular features. Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How easy was it to install and set up your smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider follow-up questions for those who found it difficult.

script.question_text: How easy was it to install and set up your smart thermostat?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smart thermostat models?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for product development insights.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smart thermostat models?

questions.question_text: How has using a smart thermostat impacted your energy bills?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived impact on energy costs.
